QuestData.Title: The Third Fall of Kel'Thuzad
QuestData.Description:
The time has come to purge Maldraxxus of treachery.
Our armies are rallied. Our allies stand ready. The machine of war is in motion.
We must win this battle, or all of the Shadowlands will be lost.
QuestData.RewardText:
Kel'Thuzad escaped into the Banished One's hands, but at least his evil has been driven from Maldraxxus.
Well fought, $p. Now we focus on rebuilding our forces and restoring order to our realm.

Objectives.Objective: Return to Baroness Draka at the Seat of the Primus
